description.en: Control your white label Zigbee devices made by Tuya

instruction.en: Push the F button on the Christmas Lights controller for aprox 5-10 seconds and release, lights should start to flash slowly.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or power on/off 5 times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink / device starts beeping).

hint.en: The time in seconds that the transition from 0-100% takes. Be aware that open/close might take a different amount of time.
hint.de: Die Zeit in Sekunden, die der Übergang von 0-100% dauert. Beachte, dass das Öffnen/Schließen unterschiedlich lange dauern kann.

hint.en: Activate to start calibration mode and deactivate to stop it. The elapsed time between will be used to calibrate 0-100%. If this does not work use the "Movement time" setting instead.
hint.de: Aktiviere diese Option, um den Kalibrierungsmodus zu starten, und deaktivieren, um ihn zu beenden. Die dazwischen verstrichene Zeit wird zum Kalibrieren von 0-100% verwendet. Wenn dies nicht funktioniert, verwende stattdessen die Einstellung "Bewegungszeit".

hint.en: When enabled controls for Up/Stop/Down will be shown in addition to the percent based controls. Some external integrations (e.g. Alexa) might not be able to determine the correct device type if enabled.
hint.de: Wenn diese Option aktiviert ist, werden zusätzlich zu den prozentualen Steuerelementen auch Steuerelemente für Auf/Stop/Ab angezeigt. Einige externe Integrationen (z. B. Alexa) sind möglicherweise nicht in der Lage, den richtigen Gerätetyp zu bestimmen, wenn diese Option aktiviert ist.

instruction.en: Press the setup button for 10 seconds or power on/off 5 times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink / device starts beeping).

hint.en: The time in seconds that the transition from 0-100% takes. Be aware that open/close might take a different amount of time.
hint.de: Die Zeit in Sekunden, die der Übergang von 0-100% dauert. Beachte, dass das Öffnen/Schließen unterschiedlich lange dauern kann.

hint.en: Activate to start calibration mode and deactivate to stop it. The elapsed time between will be used to calibrate 0-100%. If this does not work use the "Movement time" setting instead.
hint.de: Aktiviere diese Option, um den Kalibrierungsmodus zu starten, und deaktivieren, um ihn zu beenden. Die dazwischen verstrichene Zeit wird zum Kalibrieren von 0-100% verwendet. Wenn dies nicht funktioniert, verwende stattdessen die Einstellung "Bewegungszeit".

hint.en: When enabled controls for Up/Stop/Down will be shown in addition to the percent based controls. Some external integrations (e.g. Alexa) might not be able to determine the correct device type if enabled.
hint.de: Wenn diese Option aktiviert ist, werden zusätzlich zu den prozentualen Steuerelementen auch Steuerelemente für Auf/Stop/Ab angezeigt. Einige externe Integrationen (z. B. Alexa) sind möglicherweise nicht in der Lage, den richtigen Gerätetyp zu bestimmen, wenn diese Option aktiviert ist.

instruction.en: Press the reset button 3 times, then press and hold the reset button until the led lights up.
instruction.nl: Druk 3 keer op de reset knop. Druk daarna nog een keer en houd de knop vast tot dat de led blijft branden.

hint.en: The maximum percentage of the curtain that can be opened. This is used to prevent the window from being opened too far.
hint.nl: Het maximale percentage van het raam dat geopend kan worden. Dit wordt gebruikt om te voorkomen dat het gordijn te ver open gaat.

instruction.en: Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Press the reset switch rapidly 10 times until the unit make a continously beep sound to enter pairing mode.
Two tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Two tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the reset switch rapidly 10 times until the unit make a continously beep sound to enter pairing mode.
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Open the device and press the reset button gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate if you experience that the Metered Power is not correct.
Range: 0.8 - 1.2, step size 0.1, 
default: 1

Set a value to compensate if you experience that the Measured Power is not correct.
Range: 0.8 - 1.2, step size 0.1, 
default: 1

Min interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)
Min interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)

instruction.en: Push the button for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If nothing happens; put two fingers against the detectors and repeat.
Press the top button for aprox 10 seconds (Zigbee logo will start blinking).

name.en: LCD Temperature, Humidity and Luminance Sensor

instruction.en: Press the reset button on the top of the unit for 10 seconds.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

Set a correction to compensate a humidity offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 1, 
default: 0 [%]
hint.nl:
Stel een correctiewaarde in om een Luchtvochtigheids verschil te compenseren.
Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 1, 
standaard: 0 [%]

instruction.en: Push the setup button on the side of the device for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If the pairing does not start, press the setup button again for 10-15 seconds until the led stops blinking and then try again.
Use a pin to press the reset button for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the WiFi icon blinks rapidly.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate if you experience that the Metered Power is not correct.
Range: 0.8 - 1.2, step size 0.1, 
default: 1

instruction.en: Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press the reset button for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks.
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press and hold the reset button for 6 seconds. When the indicator light flashes it is in pairing mode.
instruction.nl: Druk 6 seconden op de reset knop. Wacht tot de led gaat knipperen.

instruction.en: Press and hold the reset button for 5 seconds. When the indicator light flashes it is in pairing mode.
Press the setup button combined with 1 channel button for 10 seconds (the LED should blink green).
Two tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button combined with 1 channel button for 10 seconds (the LED should blink green).
Four tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button combined with 1 channel button for 10 seconds (the LED should blink blue).
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.

instruction.en: Power on to enter pairing mode.
Press and hold the button inside the battery compartment for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
instruction.sv: Håll ned knappen inne i batterifacket i ca 5 sekunder tills LED-lampan blinkar snabbt.
instruction.it: Tenere premuto il pulsante all'interno del vano batteria per cicrca 5 secondi finchè il LED non lampeggia rapidamente.
instruction.nl: Houd de knop binnenin het batterijcompartiment ongeveer 5 seconden ingedrukt totdat de LED snel knippert.
instruction.de: Drücken und halten Sie die Taste im Batteriefach ca. 5 Sekunden lang, bis die LED schnell blinkt.

instruction.en: Press the RESET pinhole on the side of the unit for 5 seconds until LED blinks.
Press the button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).

instruction.en: Ensure the indicator light is flashing. If the indicator light isn't flashing: press and hold on/off buttons for 5 seconds until the indicator light starts to flashing.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Press 'Pair' button for 5 seconds until antenna symbol starts to blink.

hint.en: 'Mon-Sun' only considers Monday Schedule for all days. 'Mon-Fri, Sat+Sun' considers Monday Schedule for all working days and Saturday and Sunday Schedule individually. On'Separate' Mode each day is scheduled individually.

children.value: List of time and temerature ranges 'hh:mm/temp' separated by a space. E.g.: '06:00/16 22:30/20 24:00/16' means: set temperature to 16°C between 00:00am and 06:00am, set temperature to 20°C between 06:00am and 10:30pm, 10:30pm to 12:00am set temperature to 16°C. Last time token must always be 24:00 with temperature.

hint.en: Required for 'Mon-Sun' and 'Mon-Fri, Sat+Sun' Mode.
Required for 'Mon-Fri, Sat+Sun' Mode
Required for 'Mon-Fri, Sat+Sun' Mode

Power on to enter pairing mode.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Power on/off 5 times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink / device starts beeping) or press the Pause-button 5sec until Open-button blinks.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Press the button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Press the left button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking). A tile for each button will be created.
Press the left button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Press the lower left button for aprox 10 seconds (all LED should start blinking).
Press the lower left button for aprox 10 seconds (all LED should start blinking).
Press the lower left button for aprox 10 seconds (all LED should start blinking).
Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

Range: 0.8 - 1.2, step size 0.1, 
default: 1

label.en: Indicates status. The indicator comes on when the switch is turned on.
Indicates position. The indicator comes on when the switch is turned off.

instruction.en: Press the button for 7 seconds (until LED starts blinking).

label.en: Light on when switch turned on.
Light on when the switch is turned off.

instruction.en: Switch the unit on and off five times and then hold for 5 seconds to enter pairing mode (the LED should flash red and blue).
A tile for each button will be created. Remove the front and press the setup button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).

label.en: Light on when switch turned on.
Light on when the switch is turned off.

instruction.en: A tile for each button will be created. Remove the front and press the setup button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).

label.en: Light on when switch turned on.
Light on when the switch is turned off.

instruction.en: A tile for each button will be created. Press the first button (or the setup button if one exists) for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).

label.en: Light on when switch turned on.
Light on when the switch is turned off.

instruction.en: Four tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Switch the unit on and off five times and hold for 5 seconds to enter pairing mode (the LED should flash red and blue).
Press the arrow down button for 8s when the thermostat is off.
Push the button for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If nothing happens; put two fingers against the detectors and repeat.
Push the button for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If nothing happens; put two fingers against the detectors and repeat.
Put the device in a USB slot and let it power up.
